translation.es: Así que ni es una decisión difícil.

translation.en: -You're Audi 5000, my friend. -Derek, can't we talk about this?
translation.es: -Quedas despedido, amigo. -¿No podemos hablar de esto?

translation.en: -Hey. -Shit.
-Is everything okay? -No. He just fired me.
translation.es: -¿Está todo bien? -No. Me acaba de despedir.

translation.en: What happened to the music?
The band left. The guy freaked out.
translation.es: El conjunto se fue. El tipo enloqueció.

translation.en: Derek fired me.
-It's no big deal. -Robert, you don't get it.
It's the Catalina Wine Mixer!
People have killed to be in the position I'm in.
translation.es: ¡Hay gente que ha matado por organizarlo!

translation.en: -He's right. It's a big deal. -Here's a thought:
I see an empty stage.
I see drums, I see a drummer.
translation.es: Veo una batería, veo un baterista.

translation.en: I see a microphone, and I see a singer.
translation.es: Veo un micrófono y veo un cantante.

translation.en: -Dad, come on. -What?
-We gave that stuff up. -We don't do that.
translation.es: -Ya dejamos todo eso. -Ya no lo hacemos.

translation.en: Listen to me. Dale, look, when I was a kid...
...when I was a little boy, I always wanted to be a dinosaur.
translation.es: ...cuando era niño, siempre quería ser un dinosaurio.

translation.en: I wanted to be a Tyrannosaurus rex more than anything.
translation.es: Quería ser un Tyrannosaurus Rex más que nada.

translation.en: I made my arms short and I roamed the backyard...
translation.es: Encogía los brazos y rondaba por el patio...

translation.en: ...and I chased the neighborhood cats, and I growled and I roared.
translation.es: ...y perseguía a los gatos y gruñía y rugía.

translation.en: Everybody knew me and was afraid of me.
And then one day, my dad said:
translation.es: Hasta que un día, mi papá dijo:

translation.en: "Bobby, you're 17. It's time to throw childish things aside."
translation.es: “Bobby, tienes 17 años. Es hora de dejar las cosas infantiles”.

translation.en: And I said, "Okay, Pop."
But he didn't really say that, he said, "Stop being a dinosaur and get a job."
translation.es: En realidad dijo: “Deja de ser un dinosaurio y consigue un trabajo”.

translation.en: But, you know, I thought to myself, "I'll go to medical school...
...I'll practice for a little while, and then I'll come back to it."
translation.es: ...ejerceré un tiempo y luego volveré a esto.

translation.en: -Dad-- -How is that a skill?
But I forgot how to do it.
You're human.
-You could never be a dinosaur. -Yeah.
translation.es: Tú jamás podrías ser un dinosaurio.

translation.en: Hey, I lost it.
-Dad, what's the point? -Yeah.
The point is don't lose your dinosaur.
translation.es: No quiero que pierdan su dinosaurio.

translation.en: Yeah. You know, I hated the way you guys were before.
I mean, I hated you.
But it just kills me to see you so crushed and normal.
translation.es: Pero me mata verlos tan aplastados y normales.

translation.en: Listen to me, don't listen to me...
...Prestige Worldwide, that's what you gotta do.
translation.es: ...Prestigio Mundial, eso es lo que necesitan hacer.

translation.en: -You're saying we should go for it. -That's what I'm saying.
What do you think, Brennan?
I'm so scared right now. I'm gonna do what's sensible:
translation.es: Tengo mucho miedo. Voy a hacer lo sensato.

translation.en: I'm gonna file for unemployment...
translation.es: Voy a pedir seguro de desempleo...

translation.en: ...and I'm gonna try to get a job at Enterprise Rent-A-Car.
Because they got a excellent corporate structure...
translation.es: Porque tienen una excelente estructura corporativa...

translation.en: ...and they give you the tools to be your own boss.
translation.es: ...y te dan las herramientas para ser tu propio jefe.

translation.en: My dad's right.
This isn't me.
I'm fucking miserable. I had to get up at 10:00 this morning.
translation.es: Soy muy infeliz. Hoy me tuve que levantar a las 10 a.m.

translation.en: And even though I just got a tidal wave of nerves...
translation.es: Y aunque acabo de sentir una ola verde de nervios...

translation.en: ...I'm going up on that stage... ...and I'm gonna make beautiful music for a sad world.
translation.es: ...voy a hacer música hermosa para un mundo triste.

translation.en: -Dale.... -That's the boy I know.
This crowd's gonna eat him alive.
translation.es: La gente se lo va a comer vivo.

translation.en: Wait, what's he doing up there?
Somebody get him off the fucking stage!
Hi. How you doing?
My name's Dale Doback, and I hope you like to kick it.
translation.es: Yo soy Dale Doback y espero que les guste relajarse.

translation.en: Oh, go get them, Dale!
Boats and ho's
Get off the stage, you dick!
Stop yelling at him.
He's a human being.
Dale has a mangina Dale has a mangina
He's up there alone, Brennan. He's up there alone.
translation.es: Está solo. Está solo allá arriba.

translation.en: -You suck! -What are you doing, Brennan?
Brennan, no!
-What did you do? -Oh, Jesus, Nancy.
I couldn't stand to see him like that. I miss my son.
translation.es: No aguantaba verlo así. Extraño a mi hijo.

translation.en: All right. Let me go for a few bars. Come in soft, but then finish strong.
translation.es: Déjame cantar unos compases. Entra suave y acaba fuerte.

translation.en: -Okay. Hey, Brennan? -Yeah.
-Thanks for coming up. -You got it, Dragon.
We got a little change coming up.
translation.es: Aquí les va un pequeño cambio.

translation.en: It's my main man Brennan.
Boats and ho's
Boats and ho's
-You did it, Derek. -I made a kite fly.
Brennan, you're the best big brother ever!
--floor mats. The ones that match the seats, and I kind of wanted--
translation.es: Tapetes. Los que van con los asientos y yo quería comprarlos.

translation.en: I traveled 500 miles to give you my seed.
translation.es: Viajé 800 kilómetros para darte mi semen.

translation.en: Lumberjack!
Rock the fuck out of those drums, Dale!
I'm sorry.
-We're Prestige Worldwide! -Prestige Worldwide!
-Fucking Catalina Wine Mixer. -It's the fucking Catalina Wine Mixer.
translation.es: -El Cóctel de Catalina. -Es el condenado Cóctel de Catalina.

translation.en: It's the fucking Catalina Wine Mixer.
Brennan, that was sublime.
Amazing. We are so proud of you both.
translation.es: Increíble. Estamos orgullosos de los dos.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Incredible.
-Thank you so much. -Hey.
So I made my quota. Yeah, we sold a shit-ton of copters.
translation.es: Hice mi cuota. Vendimos una tonelada de helicópteros.

translation.en: -That's so good. -Yeah.
Look, I'm not great at this Hallmark stuff...
translation.es: No soy bueno para estas cosas sentimentales...

translation.en: ...but, Brennan, when I look at you now...
...I don't wanna kick you in the head quite as much.
translation.es: ...ya no quiero patearte tanto en la cabeza.

translation.en: Thanks, man.
-That was beautiful. -That was nice.
-What do we do now? -We could hug.
Yeah, you'd like that, faggot. Sorry. I'm--
Okay.
-It's okay. -Okay.
-That's what we've been looking for. -That's the ticket.
translation.es: -Eso era lo que queríamos. -Así se hace.

translation.en: We've never done anything like that, so you can't expect it to be perfect.
translation.es: Nunca habíamos hecho nada parecido, no puede salir perfecto.

translation.en: It was good.
-Felt good. -Gotten close to a hug.
-Hello, Brennan. Hi. -Denise. Hey.
Robert, Mom, Derek, this is my girlfriend, Denise.
translation.es: Robert, mamá, Derek. Les presento a mi novia, Denise.

translation.en: -Hi. How are you? -Actually, I'm his therapist.
-We are in absolutely no way dating. -Right.
Brennan told me he was going to hurl his body off a helicopter...
translation.es: Brennan me dijo que se iba a lanzar de un helicóptero...

translation.en: ...into shark-infested waters...
...so I had a legal obligation to be here.
translation.es: Tenía la obligación legal de estar aquí.

translation.en: I get it.
Don't wanna appear too eager, and that is a good strategy too.
translation.es: No quieres parecer demasiado ansiosa. Es una buena estrategia.

translation.en: You are an enabler. You think you're helping...
-...but you're not. -And you are a keeper.
translation.es: -No le ayuda. -Y tú eres una buena candidata.

translation.en: What'd you think?
Brennan, I thought you were incredibly brave.
And I mean that...
...in strictly the most clinical and professional sense possible...
translation.es: ...en el mayor sentido clínico y profesional posible...

translation.en: ...with no emotional, intimate, sexual...
...or any other undertones that you could possibly infer.
God, you're gonna make me cry.
translation.es: Dios mío, me vas a hacer llorar.

translation.en: What poem is that from? Is that James Joyce?
translation.es: ¿De qué poema sacaste eso? ¿De uno de James Joyce?

translation.en: -...I like making sex with you. -Yeah.
I do. But you're also married.
translation.es: Es verdad. Pero también eres casada.

translation.en: It's over.
This is crazy. I'm a mother.
translation.es: Es una locura. Soy una mamá.

translation.en: I have two children, I have a husband, a beautiful home.
translation.es: Tengo dos hijos, un esposo, una casa hermosa.

translation.en: -I can't be fucking around with you. -It was fun. It was fun, right?
-It was fun while it lasted. -I'm glad. All right, well, good luck.
-No. -Oh, my God, Dale!
-Please don't leave me. -Oh, my God. Look at that whale.
translation.es: -¡Por favor no me dejes! -¡Dios mío, mira esa ballena!

translation.en: Where?
Dale!
So I was with Seal...
...and we were just taking a chopper up to Everest base camp...
translation.es: ...y llevamos un helicóptero al campamento base del Everest...

translation.en: -...and the plot to my Sherpa-- -Derek. Derek.
-Sorry. Okay. -Remember, we talked about this.
Dale, Brennan. Tell me about the karaoke business.
translation.es: Dale, Brennan. Háblenme del negocio del karaoke.

translation.en: Really great, Dad. Yeah. We call it Karaoke 'n' Roll.
translation.es: Va excelente, papá. Lo llamamos Karaoke ‘N’ Roll.

translation.en: We got six bars, three restaurants, and two more wanna sign up.
translation.es: Tenemos seis bares, tres restaurantes y dos más posibles.

translation.en: -So it's booming. -Fantastic.
Most karaoke it's, "Open to everyone.
-Hey, just get up and have fun." -Not you guys.
translation.es: "¡Que suba el que quiera y diviértanse!"

translation.en: If you can't sing, just sit down. That's our motto.
translation.es: Nuestro lema es: “Si no sabes cantar, siéntate”.

translation.en: -It's the big leagues. -You guys are doing so great.
translation.es: -Son las ligas mayores. -Les está yendo muy bien.

translation.en: Guys, I have a little Christmas surprise for Dale and Brennan.
translation.es: Muchachos, tengo una sorpresa de Navidad para Dale y Brennan.

translation.en: -You wanna see it? -Yes!
-You bet! -Let's go look at it! Come on.
-Don't peek. -I smell cookies.
Be patient. No, no. No, no.
-Just a piñata, isn't it? -Be patient. Be patient.
-Be patient. -Did you get me a tiger, Dad?
Okay, open your eyes.
Merry Christmas.
Holy shit!
Dad, I can't believe you put the boat in the tree!
translation.es: ¡No puedo creer que pusiste el barco en el árbol!

translation.en: This is amazing!
-It's The Gilded Lady. She lives! -I can't believe it.
translation.es: ¡Es la Dama Dorada! ¡Está viva! ¡No lo puedo creer!

translation.en: -How'd you get it up here? -Oh, Robert, it's so great.
translation.es: -¿Cómo lo subiste ahí? -Ay, Robert, qué maravilla.

translation.en: -Pirate hats! -Pirate hats!
-Hustlers! -Hustlers!
Dad, that was so thoughtful!
-Crossbows! -Crossbows!
You guys finally came to your senses and got us something cool.
translation.es: Por fin entraron en razón y nos dieron algo cool.

translation.en: You both know this is completely fucked up, right?
translation.es: Saben que esto está totalmente jodido, ¿no?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Of course.
But Brennan sure can wear the shit out of that pirate hat.
translation.es: Brennan sabe usar ese sombrero con mucho estilo.

translation.en: -Chewbacca masks! -Chewbacca masks!
It's okay that mine's not movie-quality.
translation.es: Está bien que la mía no sea de calidad profesional.

translation.en: But he's like, "No, because you drove my car last week, so I can't get it."
translation.es: Dijo: “No, porque manejaste mi coche la semana pasada”.

translation.en: So I'm like "You're gonna buy it for me or I'm gonna sock you in the mouth."
translation.es: Y le dije: “Me lo vas a comprar o te voy a pegar en la boca”.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Well, if it isn't Dale Doback and his little butt buddy.
translation.es: Si son Dale Doback y su amiguito de nalgas.

translation.en: Sticks and stones may break my bones...
translation.es: “No oigo, no oigo, soy de palo...”

translation.en: ...but I'm gonna kick you repeatedly in the balls, Gardocki!
translation.es: ...¡pero te voy a patear en las pelotas, Gardocki!

translation.en: Let's get them!
The cops'll be here soon.
I guess this is what it feels like to be grown up.
translation.es: Parece que así se siente ser un adulto.

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Yeah, of course.
You know back when you first moved in?
translation.es: ¿Cuando llegaste la primera vez a la casa...

translation.en: -Did you touch my drum set? -No, I didn't.
No, really, I won't get mad. I just wanna know.
translation.es: No me voy a enojar. Solo quiero saber.

translation.en: No, I know. You said you wouldn't get mad.
translation.es: Ya lo sé. Sí, no te vas a enojar.

translation.en: I'm saying I didn't do it. I didn't do it, I never did it.
translation.es: Solo digo que no lo hice. No lo hice, nunca.

translation.en: -Then I owe you an apology. -No.
No, you don't, at all. No.
Why wouldn't you take an apology if you didn't do it?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no aceptas la disculpa si no lo hiciste?

translation.en: Just because I'm cool. It doesn't matter.
You got my passport.
I'm good.
Don't worry, not gonna be late. Don't worry.
translation.es: No te preocupes, no voy a llegar tarde.
